about_the_game:
About the Game

What if a mortal knight, bound by his oath, set out to rescue his beloved fiancée from the clutches of a dark vampire lord?

… Only to discover she’s already been turned into a monster…
… And that he himself is dead…
… Doomed to live under a terrible curse that drags him back to life again and again, forcing him to relive the same nightmare: seven days and seven nights of endless battles.

Can he break the cycle, defeat the monstrous vampire-lord, and free his beloved and his lands from the grip of darkness?

Key Features

  • Deckbuilding With Total Control
    Unlike other games in the genre, where the cards you draw are at the mercy of chance, our game lets you build your deck right at the start of each run, giving you full control over your initial strategy. As the run progresses, upgrade and transform your cards in ways that significantly alter their effects, ensuring that even the same starting deck can evolve into something entirely unique by the end.

  • Synergies and Creative Combos

    The design revolves around powerful synergies and combo effects, driven by omens and artifacts that do more than boost stats—they change the rules. Melee attacks become ranged, shots fire in all directions, or you survive at zero health. These effects open the door to unconventional builds and surprising combos.

  • Unlimited Actions

    The Vow has no limit on how many actions you can do each turn. Play your cards right, chain them together, draw even more cards, and unleash devastating combos to crush your enemies.

  • Story Driven Roguelike

    The game features a full-fledged story campaign, setting it apart from many traditional roguelikes. Follow the journey of a cursed knight trapped in a repeating cycle, uncover the fate of his fiancée, and piece together the events that brought him here. All the characters you meet are someone you know, and depending on your actions they will be powerful allies or formidable enemies.

By the Numbers

  • 3 unique classes, each with distinct abilities and playstyles

  • 6 story-driven bosses with unique mechanics and challenges

  • 30 powerful artifacts to shape your strategy

  • 30 ominous omens to twist the game’s rules

  • 150 ability cards to craft your perfect deck...

  • ...each with 2 distinctive upgrade options

  • 8 unique village houses, each offering game-changing effects

A Roguelike Journey Through Time and Horror

Dive into a dark, gothic world where strategy, tactics, and deckbuilding combine. With each loop, uncover more of the knight’s cursed story and discover new ways to overcome impossible odds. Will you break the cycle—or succumb to it?

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A game of tactical combat in blood and darkness. The Vow is a powerful blend of roguelike deckbuilding and turn-based tactics. Build your deck, master synergies, and battle through seven cursed nights to rescue your fiancée from the vampire’s grasp.
